snippet.title: Heart Electric | January Open Playtest Announcement
snippet.description:
Gather your friends for a showdown - it's time to start testing Heart Electric!
Our first Winter Playtest takes place January 18th, starting 09:00 PST for NA, 18:00 CET for EU.
Request Playtest access on Steam here: https://bit.ly/4esdRJg

More information can be found in our Discord, so now's the time to jump in and get HYPE!

Wishlist on Steam and sign up to Playtest: https://bit.ly/4esdRJg
Join the Discord: https://discord.com/invite/heart-electric

More details on our website: https://modoyo.com/heartelectric

Follow our other socials!
X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/Modoyostudios
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@playheartelectric
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heartelectricgame/

#heartelectric #fps #playtest #openbeta
